name: Shift: Prelude (Crunchless)
description:
Shift: Prelude introduces us to the "Shifter", and the mysterious wizard that employs him. In this snack-sized hack and slash RPG, you help these characters return home to the wizard's tower after they find themselves lost in an enchanted forest.

This introductory adventure gives players a glimpse of the world of Shift. In order to make it out of the forest, you will need to outwit the Dart Lizards and steal enough blood from a foul troll for the Wizard to finish his spell. But don't stray too far from the path, or you may encounter a monstrous Thorn Gremlin...
